text: Sabah Bizi (13 November 1946 – 16 January 2025) was an Albanian footballer. He played for Vllaznia Shkodër and Partizani Tirana as well as the Albania national team.Bizi: ja jeta ime me futbollinHistoria e madhe e Sabah Bizit He played for the national team from 1967 to 1976, making fifteen appearances. Bizi died on 16 January 2025, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Albanian footballers
title: Sabah Bizi
